attributes.action: Consult urgently with the Environment Agency to stop the proposed increase in rod licence fees due to be enforced in 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the game fishing fraternity vehemently oppose any futher increase in the cost of our rod licences.

The only notification of this stealth increase was tucked away in a page of the Daily Mirror on 25th July 2007. Why have the numerous angling associations not been notified?

Why is it always the game fishermen who bear the brunt of increases, and not other river users, for example canoeists?
